00037 #include "egs_timer.h"
00038 #include "egs_functions.h"
00039 
00040 #ifdef WIN32
00041 #include <ctime>
00042 
00043 class EGS_PrivateTimer {
00044 public:
00045   EGS_PrivateTimer() : mark(clock()) {};
00046   unsigned long mark;
00047   void start() { mark = clock(); };
00048   EGS_Float time() {
00049       EGS_Float cpu = clock(); return (cpu - mark)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00050   };
00051 };
00052 
00053 #else
00054 
00055 #include <sys/times.h>
00056 #include <unistd.h>
00057 
00058 clock_t clps = 0;
00059 
00060 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00061 
00067 class EGS_PrivateTimer {
00068 public:
00069   tms tstart, tend;
00070   EGS_PrivateTimer() {
00071     if( !clps ) {
00072       clps = sysconf(_SC_CLK_TCK);
00073     }
00074     times(&tstart);
00075   };
00076   void start() {
00077     if( times(&tstart) < 0 ) egsWarning(" times returned < 0???\n");
00078   };
00079   EGS_Float time() {
00080     times(&tend); EGS_Float cpu = tend.tms_utime;
00081     return (cpu - tstart.tms_utime)/clps;
00082   };
00083 };
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 EGS_Timer::EGS_Timer() { p = new EGS_PrivateTimer; }
00089 
00090 EGS_Timer::~EGS_Timer() { delete p; }
00091 
00092 void EGS_Timer::start() { p->start(); }
00093 
00094 EGS_Float EGS_Timer::time() { return p->time(); }
